option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# ✅ Dynamic Streak Counter - Now Live & Database-Driven!
## Build Status: SUCCESS
The streak counter is now **fully dynamic** and calculates real-time from your database records!
---
## What Changed
### **Before: Static Placeholder** ```java private int calculateStreak() { return 4; // Always returns 4 } ```
### **After: Dynamic Database Calculation** ```java private int calculateStreak() { // Checks last 30 days of actual data // Counts consecutive days within safe range (0.9 kg/day) // Returns real streak number } ```
---
## How It Works
### **Streak Logic**
1. **Start from yesterday** (not today, since today is in progress) 2. **Go backwards day by day** (up to 30 days) 3. **For each day**: - Calculate total CO2 (app usage + notifications + appliances) - Check if within safe range (≤ 0.9 kg/day) - If yes → increment streak - If exceeded → break (streak ended) - If no data → skip and continue checking
4. **Return streak count**
### **Example Scenarios**
#### **Scenario 1: Perfect Streak** ``` Today: Nov 13 (in progress, not counted) Nov 12: 0.7 kg ✓ (within range) Nov 11: 0.8 kg ✓ (within range) Nov 10: 0.6 kg ✓ (within range) Nov 9: 0.85 kg ✓ (within range)
Streak: 4 days ```
#### **Scenario 2: Broken Streak** ``` Today: Nov 13 (in progress) Nov 12: 0.7 kg ✓ (within range) Nov 11: 0.8 kg ✓ (within range) Nov 10: 1.2 kg ✗ (exceeded!) Nov 9: 0.6 kg ✓ (doesn't count, streak broken)
Streak: 2 days ```
#### **Scenario 3: Days with No Data** ``` Today: Nov 13 (in progress) Nov 12: 0.7 kg ✓ (within range) Nov 11: 0.0 kg - (no data, skip) Nov 10: 0.6 kg ✓ (within range) Nov 9: 0.8 kg ✓ (within range)
Streak: 3 days (Nov 12, 10, 9) ```
#### **Scenario 4: New User** ``` Today: Nov 13 (first day using app) No previous data
Streak: 0 days ```
---
## Calculation Details
### **Daily CO2 Calculation** ```java For each day: 1. App Usage CO2 - Query all AppUsage records for that day - Sum estimatedKgCO2
2. Notifications CO2 - Query all NotificationEvent records for that day - Sum estimatedKgCO2
3. Appliances CO2 - Get all ApplianceLog records - Sum estimatedKgCO2PerDay (they apply to every day)
Total = App Usage + Notifications + Appliances ```
### **Safe Range Check** ```java Safe Range: 0.9 kg CO2/day
If (Total > 0 && Total <= 0.9): ✓ Within range - increment streak
If (Total > 0.9): ✗ Exceeded - break streak
If (Total == 0): - No data - skip this day, continue checking ```
### **Helper Methods**
#### **getDayStartTimestamp()** ```java // Gets midnight timestamp for a given day Calendar dayStart = calendar.clone(); dayStart.set(HOUR_OF_DAY, 0); dayStart.set(MINUTE, 0); dayStart.set(SECOND, 0); dayStart.set(MILLISECOND, 0); return dayStart.getTimeInMillis(); ```
#### **calculateDayCO2()** ```java // Calculates total CO2 for a specific day range double dayCO2 = 0.0;
// App usage between dayStartMs and dayEndMs // + Notifications between dayStartMs and dayEndMs // + Appliances (constant per day)
return dayCO2; ```
---
## Technical Implementation
### **Performance Optimizations**
1. **Limited Lookback**: Only checks 30 days (not entire history) 2. **Early Break**: Stops when streak is broken (doesn't check older days) 3. **Background Thread**: Called from executor, doesn't block UI 4. **Exception Handling**: Returns 0 if database errors occur
### **Database Queries** ```java // Efficient queries with timestamp filtering - appUsageDao().getLatest(1000) → Filter by timestamp range
- notificationEventDao().getAll() → Filter by timestamp range
- applianceDao().getAll() → Applied to every day ```
### **Edge Cases Handled**
✅ **No data available**: Returns 0 ✅ **Database errors**: Returns 0 with error logging ✅ **Days with partial data**: Counted if within range ✅ **New user**: Returns 0 (no streak yet) ✅ **Long gaps**: Continues through no-data days ✅ **Today in progress**: Not counted (streak is for completed days)
---
## User Experience
### **Display Updates**
The streak counter updates automatically when: - ✅ App opens (onCreate) - ✅ User returns to dashboard (onResume) - ✅ Force sync completes (after 2 seconds) - ✅ New data is recorded
### **Visual Feedback**
**Top Stats Bar**: ``` 4 0.18kg 0.45kg 0.15kg ```
The number next to the fire icon () shows your current streak!
### **Streak Interpretation**
| Streak | Meaning | |--------|---------| | 0 | No streak (new user or broke streak yesterday) | | 1 | Yesterday was within safe range | | 3 | Last 3 days were within safe range | | 7 | Full week within safe range! | | 14 | Two weeks streak! | | 30 | Maximum displayed (1 month!) |
---
## Benefits
### **Before (Static)** ❌ Always showed "4 days" ❌ Not motivating (fake number) ❌ No connection to actual behavior ❌ Misleading to users
### **After (Dynamic)** ✅ Shows real achievement ✅ Motivates sustainable behavior ✅ Reflects actual low-carbon days ✅ Accurate and honest ✅ Gamification that works
---
## Examples in Action
### **Week 1: Starting Out** ``` Mon: 0.8 kg ✓ Tue: 1.1 kg ✗ (exceeded) Wed: 0.7 kg ✓ Thu: 0.6 kg ✓ Fri: 0.9 kg ✓ Sat: 0.85 kg ✓
Current Streak: 4 days (Wed-Sat) ```
### **Week 2: Perfect Week** ``` Sun: 0.7 kg ✓ Mon: 0.65 kg ✓ Tue: 0.8 kg ✓ Wed: 0.75 kg ✓ Thu: 0.82 kg ✓ Fri: 0.88 kg ✓ Sat: 0.79 kg ✓
Current Streak: 11 days (previous 4 + this week's 7) ```
### **Week 3: Streak Broken** ``` Sun: 0.7 kg ✓ Mon: 1.2 kg ✗ (exceeded!) Tue: 0.6 kg ✓
Current Streak: 1 day (only Tuesday counts, Mon broke it) ```
---
## Integration with App
### **Dashboard Display** - Streak shown in top stats bar (green background) - Updates in real-time when data changes - Always shows most recent streak count
### **Motivation System** - Seeing streak grow encourages sustainable habits - Breaking streak provides feedback to adjust behavior - Weekly progress circles show visual streak history
### **Data Flow** ``` User Action (app usage, notifications, appliances) ↓ Data saved to Room database ↓ Dashboard loads/refreshes ↓ calculateStreak() queries database ↓ Counts consecutive days ≤ 0.9 kg ↓ Updates UI with real streak number ```
---
## Algorithm Details
### **Pseudocode** ``` function calculateStreak(): streak = 0 today = getCurrentDate() currentDate = today - 1 day // Start from yesterday
for i = 0 to 29: // Check up to 30 days dayStart = midnight of currentDate dayEnd = 11:59:59 PM of currentDate
totalCO2 = calculateDayCO2(dayStart, dayEnd)
if totalCO2 > 0 AND totalCO2 <= 0.9: streak = streak + 1 // Good day! else if totalCO2 > 0.9: break // Streak broken, stop checking // if totalCO2 == 0, skip (no data), continue
currentDate = currentDate - 1 day
return streak ```
### **Time Complexity** - **Best case**: O(1) - Yesterday exceeded, immediate break - **Worst case**: O(30) - Check all 30 days - **Average case**: O(7-14) - Most streaks are 1-2 weeks
### **Space Complexity** - O(1) - Only stores streak counter - Database queries handled by Room (cached)
---
## ✅ Testing Checklist
To verify the streak counter works correctly:
1. **New User**: - [ ] Shows 0 on first launch
2. **First Day Under Budget**: - [ ] Shows 0 today (day not complete) - [ ] Shows 1 tomorrow (after midnight)
3. **Multiple Days Under Budget**: - [ ] Increments by 1 each day - [ ] Shows correct count
4. **Day Over Budget**: - [ ] Resets streak to 0 - [ ] Next day starts counting from 1
5. **Data Refresh**: - [ ] Updates when returning to dashboard - [ ] Updates after force sync
6. **Edge Cases**: - [ ] Handles missing data gracefully - [ ] Doesn't crash on database errors - [ ] Works across date boundaries
---
## Visual Indicators
### **Top Stats Bar Colors** - **Green background**: Streak counter area - **Fire icon** (): Universal streak symbol - **White text**: Streak number
### **Streak Badges (Future Enhancement)** ``` 1-6 days: Keep going! 7-13 days: One week streak! 14-20 days: Two weeks! 21-29 days: Three weeks! 30+ days: Champion! ```
---
## Analytics Potential
With dynamic streak data, you can: - Track user engagement - Identify behavior patterns - Reward long streaks - Send encouragement notifications - Create leaderboards (future) - Generate progress reports
---
## Future Enhancements
Possible improvements: - [ ] Show longest streak ever achieved - [ ] Streak history graph - [ ] Streak recovery challenges - [ ] Share streak on social media - [ ] Streak milestones (7, 14, 30, 100 days) - [ ] Push notifications: "Don't break your streak!" - [ ] Streak freeze feature (1 day over budget forgiven)
---
## ✨ Summary
**Dynamic Streak Counter Now**: - ✅ Calculates from real database records - ✅ Checks consecutive days within safe range - ✅ Updates automatically on data changes - ✅ Handles edge cases gracefully - ✅ Motivates sustainable behavior - ✅ Shows accurate achievement
**The streak counter is now a true reflection of your low-carbon journey!**
---
*Implemented: November 13, 2025* *Build Status: SUCCESS* ✅ *Streak Counter: FULLY DYNAMIC*

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Community Fragment - Soft Pop Style with Podium --> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/cream_background" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvCommunityTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Community" android:textSize="28sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCommunitySubtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Compete and connect with others" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- Leaderboard Card with Hard Shadow --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Weekly Leaderboard" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" />
<!-- Podium Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/podiumContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="bottom|center_horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<!-- 2nd Place --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgSecondPlace" android:layout_width="56dp" android:layout_height="56dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_avatar_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="2nd Place" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSecondName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Maria" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvSecondScore" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="4.2 kg" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<!-- Silver Podium --> <View android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="50dp" android:background="@color/shadow_gray" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- 1st Place (Taller) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgFirstPlace" android:layout_width="72dp" android:layout_height="72dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_avatar_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="1st Place" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvFirstName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Juan" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvFirstScore" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="3.8 kg" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/matcha_green" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Gold Podium --> <View android:layout_width="70dp" android:layout_height="70dp" android:background="@color/marigold" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- 3rd Place --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginStart="8dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imgThirdPlace" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_avatar_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="3rd Place" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvThirdName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Anna" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvThirdScore" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="4.5 kg" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<!-- Bronze Podium --> <View android:layout_width="50dp" android:layout_height="35dp" android:background="@color/coral" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Your Rank --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_pill_green" android:padding="12dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="#12" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/matcha_green" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Your current rank" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvYourScore" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="5.8 kg" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Forum Section Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Community Discussions" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- Forum Topic 1 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Tips for reducing phone usage?" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Posted by @eco_warrior • 23 replies" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Forum Topic 2 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Best energy-efficient appliances 2025" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Posted by @green_living • 45 replies" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Forum Topic 3 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Celebrating my first carbon-neutral week! " android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Posted by @nature_love • 67 replies" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Forum Topic 4 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Anyone tried the tree planting program?" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Posted by @plant_parent • 31 replies" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Dashboard Fragment - Soft Pop / Duolingo Style with Mascot --> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/cream_background">
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Top Bar with Avatar and Tree Lives --> <include layout="@layout/view_top_bar" android:id="@+id/topBar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
<!-- Vine Path / Weekly Progress Header --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/vinePathContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:background="@color/cream_background">
<!-- Day 1 (Sun) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/seedDay1" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_day_seed_inactive" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="Sunday" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="S" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Day 2 (Mon) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/seedDay2" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_day_seed_inactive" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="Monday" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="M" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Day 3 (Tue) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/seedDay3" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_day_seed_inactive" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="Tuesday" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="T" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Day 4 (Wed) - Today --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/seedDay4" android:layout_width="44dp" android:layout_height="44dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_day_seed_active" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="Wednesday - Today" app:tint="@android:color/white" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="W" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/matcha_green" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Day 5 (Thu) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/seedDay5" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_day_seed_inactive" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="Thursday" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="T" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Day 6 (Fri) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/seedDay6" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_day_seed_inactive" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="Friday" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="F" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Day 7 (Sat) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/seedDay7" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_day_seed_inactive" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:padding="8dp" android:contentDescription="Saturday" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="S" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Mascot Section with Leaves Container --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/mascotContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="220dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp">
<!-- Falling Leaves Container (for particle effect) --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/leavesContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
<!-- Mascot Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/imgMascot" android:layout_width="180dp" android:layout_height="180dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/mascot_happy" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:contentDescription="Karbono Mascot" />
<!-- Speech Bubble --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/speechBubble" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_speech_bubble" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvMascotMessage" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Looking good! " android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:maxWidth="140dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Today's Carbon Display --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:paddingVertical="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Today's Carbon" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTodayCarbon" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="2.4" android:textSize="48sp" android:textColor="@color/matcha_green" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" kg" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCarbonStatus" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="✓ Within daily limit (6.8 kg)" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/matcha_green" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bento Box Cards Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="24dp">
<!-- Smartphone Card --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardSmartphone" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_phone" app:tint="@color/marigold" android:contentDescription="Phone" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Smartphone" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvPhoneCarbonValue" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="0.8 kg" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="@color/marigold" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<!-- Top Apps List --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Top apps:" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTopApp1" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="• TikTok: 2h" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTopApp2" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="• YouTube: 1.5h" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTopApp3" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="• Instagram: 45m" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Appliances Card --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardAppliances" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_appliance" app:tint="@color/coral" android:contentDescription="Appliances" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Appliances" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvApplianceCarbonValue" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="1.6 kg" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="@color/coral" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<!-- Top Appliances List --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Active:" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTopAppliance1" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="• AC: 8h" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTopAppliance2" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="• Refrigerator: 24h" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTopAppliance3" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="• TV: 3h" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Quick Action Button --> <TextView android:id="@+id/btnStartTracking" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_button_green" android:gravity="center" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:text="Start Tracking " android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>
</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Marketplace Fragment - Soft Pop Style with Tabs --> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/cream_background">
<!-- Header Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvMarketplaceTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Marketplace" android:textSize="28sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginStart="20dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvMarketplaceSubtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Offset your carbon footprint" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginStart="20dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tvMarketplaceTitle" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<!-- Tab Container with Hard Shadow --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/tabContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:padding="4dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_tab_container" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tvMarketplaceSubtitle" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tabPlantTrees" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text=" Plant Trees" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/card_white" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/bg_button_green" android:paddingVertical="12dp" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tabAppliances" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text=" Appliances" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:gravity="center" android:paddingVertical="12dp" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tabThrift" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text=" Thrift" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:gravity="center" android:paddingVertical="12dp" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Marketplace Items RecyclerView --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvMarketplaceItems" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingBottom="16dp" android:clipToPadding="false" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tabContainer" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" tools:listitem="@layout/item_marketplace" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Profile Fragment - Soft Pop Style --> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/cream_background" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<!-- Profile Header Card --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="24dp" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<!-- Avatar --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/imgProfileAvatar" android:layout_width="100dp" android:layout_height="100dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_avatar_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="Profile Avatar" />
<!-- Username --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvUsername" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="EcoWarrior_PH" android:textSize="22sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<!-- Join Date --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvJoinDate" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Member since Dec 2025" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- Stats Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="20dp">
<!-- Streak Stat --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvStreakStat" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="12" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="@color/marigold" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Day Streak" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Trees Planted Stat --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTreesPlanted" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="5" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="@color/matcha_green" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Trees Planted" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- CO2 Saved Stat --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCO2Saved" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="24kg" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="@color/coral" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="CO₂ Offset" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badges Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Achievements" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- Badges Grid (2 rows x 4 columns) --> <GridLayout android:id="@+id/badgesGrid" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:columnCount="4" android:rowCount="2" android:alignmentMode="alignBounds">
<!-- Badge 1: First Tree --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_tree" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_unlocked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="First Tree Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="First Tree" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badge 2: 7 Day Streak --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_streak" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_unlocked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="7 Day Streak Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="7 Day" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badge 3: Eco Warrior --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_unlocked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="Eco Warrior Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Eco Hero" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badge 4: Top 10 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_community" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_locked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="Top 10 Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Top 10" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badge 5: 30 Day Streak (Locked) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_streak" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_locked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="30 Day Streak Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="30 Days" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badge 6: Carbon Zero (Locked) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_leaf" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_locked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="Carbon Zero Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Zero CO₂" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badge 7: Forest Maker (Locked) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_tree" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_locked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="Forest Maker Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="10 Trees" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Badge 8: Champion (Locked) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_community" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_locked" android:padding="10dp" android:contentDescription="Champion Badge" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Champion" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@color/text_tertiary" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</GridLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Settings Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="⚙️ Settings" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- App Preferences Button --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/btnAppPreferences" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_settings" app:tint="@color/text_secondary" android:contentDescription="Preferences" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="App Preferences" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_right" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" android:contentDescription="Go" />
</LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="@color/divider" />
<!-- Notifications Button --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/btnNotificationSettings" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_notification" app:tint="@color/text_secondary" android:contentDescription="Notifications" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Notification Settings" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_right" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" android:contentDescription="Go" />
</LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="@color/divider" />
<!-- About Button --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/btnAbout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_info" app:tint="@color/text_secondary" android:contentDescription="About" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="About Karbono" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_right" app:tint="@color/text_tertiary" android:contentDescription="Go" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Logout Button --> <TextView android:id="@+id/btnLogout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sign Out" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/coral" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Marketplace Item Card - Soft Pop Style with Hard Shadow --> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_card_hard_shadow" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Item Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/imgMarketItem" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:background="@drawable/bg_avatar_circle" android:src="@drawable/ic_tree" android:contentDescription="Marketplace Item" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
<!-- Item Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvItemTitle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mango Tree" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="@color/text_dark" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/imgMarketItem" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/imgMarketItem" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Item Description --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvItemDescription" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Offsets 12kg CO₂/year" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tvItemTitle" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/imgMarketItem" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Price Button --> <TextView android:id="@+id/btnBuyItem" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="₱500 + 2" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:background="@drawable/bg_button_green" android:paddingHorizontal="20dp" android:paddingVertical="10dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tvItemDescription" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/imgMarketItem" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- App name --> <string name="app_name">Karbono</string>
<!-- Navigation --> <string name="nav_dashboard">Dashboard</string> <string name="nav_track">Track</string> <string name="nav_appliances">Appliances</string> <string name="nav_settings">Settings</string>
<!-- Dashboard --> <string name="today_total">Today\'s Total</string> <string name="kg_co2">6.8 kg CO₂</string> <string name="safe_range_label">Within safe range (6.8 kg/day)</string> <string name="breakdown_title">Breakdown</string> <string name="streak_value_sample">4 days in safe range</string> <string name="streak_label">days in safe range</string> <string name="quick_actions">Quick Actions</string> <string name="force_sync">Force Sync</string> <string name="view_details">View details</string> <string name="unsynced_items">Unsynced Items</string>
<!-- Track tabs --> <string name="tab_live">Live</string> <string name="tab_notifications">Notifications</string> <string name="tab_appliances">Appliances</string>
<!-- Live tracking --> <string name="screen_on_today">Screen On Today</string> <string name="screen_carbon_sample">≈ 0.18 kg CO₂</string> <string name="tracking_settings">Tracking Settings</string> <string name="track_app_usage">Track app usage</string> <string name="track_notifications">Track notifications</string> <string name="top_apps_today">Top Apps Today</string> <string name="view_all">View All</string>
<!-- Notifications --> <string name="search_notifications">Search notifications…</string> <string name="notifications_today">notifications today</string> <string name="recent_notifications">Recent Notifications</string>
<!-- Appliances --> <string name="appliances_today">Appliances Today</string> <string name="appliances_count_sample">2 active appliances</string> <string name="active_appliances">Active Appliances</string> <string name="view_all_appliances">View All Appliances</string> <string name="add_appliance">Add appliance</string> <string name="total_appliances_today">Total Appliances Today</string> <string name="all_appliances">All Appliances</string>
<!-- Add appliance dialog --> <string name="add_appliance_title">Add Appliance</string> <string name="appliance_name_hint">Appliance name</string> <string name="daily_hours_hint">Daily usage hours</string> <string name="hours_per_day">hrs/day</string> <string name="power_consumption_hint">Power consumption</string> <string name="watts">W</string> <string name="estimated_impact_placeholder">Estimated: ~0.00 kg CO₂/day</string> <string name="cancel">Cancel</string> <string name="save">Save</string>
<!-- Sync & Settings --> <string name="sync_title">Sync</string> <string name="firestore_sync">Firestore Sync</string> <string name="last_synced_sample">Last synced: 14:45</string> <string name="auto_sync">Auto-sync</string> <string name="sync_now">Sync Now</string> <string name="settings_title">Settings</string> <string name="daily_safe_range">Daily Safe Range</string> <string name="safe_range_value">6.3 kg CO₂/day</string> <string name="safe_range_description">Your personal carbon budget for sustainable usage</string> <string name="daily_reminders">Daily reminders</string> <string name="about_title">About</string> <string name="app_version">Version 1.0.0</string>
<!-- Sync status --> <string name="sync_status_offline">Offline</string> <string name="sync_status_syncing">Syncing…</string> <string name="sync_status_synced">Last synced: %s</string>

<!-- Content descriptions (accessibility) --> <string name="screen_time_icon">Screen time icon</string> <string name="streak_icon">Streak icon</string> <string name="metric_icon">Metric icon</string> <string name="app_icon">App icon</string> <string name="notification_icon">Notification icon</string> <string name="appliances_icon">Appliances icon</string> <string name="firestore_icon">Firestore icon</string> <string name="progress_ring">Progress ring</string> <string name="chart_icon">Chart</string> <string name="empty_state_icon">Empty state</string>
<!-- Error messages --> <string name="error_sync_failed">Sync failed. Please try again.</string> <string name="error_invalid_input">Please enter valid values</string> <string name="error_network">Network error. Check your connection.</string>
<!-- Success messages --> <string name="success_appliance_added">Appliance added successfully</string> <string name="success_sync_complete">Sync complete</string>
<!-- Top Stats Bar --> <string name="phone_carbon">Phone carbon</string> <string name="appliances_carbon">Appliances carbon</string> <string name="notifications_carbon">Notifications carbon</string>
<!-- Weekly Progress --> <string name="your_progress">Your Progress</string> <string name="this_week">This Week</string>
<!-- Formulas Page --> <string name="calculation_formulas">Calculation Formulas</string> <string name="view_formulas">View calculation formulas</string> <string name="back">Back</string> <string name="formulas_intro_title">How We Calculate Carbon</string> <string name="formulas_intro_description">All carbon calculations are based on scientific research and industry-standard conversion factors. Below are the formulas used to track your digital carbon footprint.</string>
<string name="phone_carbon_title">Phone Usage Carbon</string> <string name="phone_formula">CO₂ = (Screen Time × Power × Carbon Factor) / 1000</string> <string name="phone_parameters">• Screen Time: Hours of active screen usage\n• Power: 3.5W average smartphone power consumption\n• Carbon Factor: 0.475 kg CO₂/kWh (global avg grid intensity)</string> <string name="phone_example">Example: 2h screen time → (2 × 3.5 × 0.475) / 1000 = 0.0033 kg CO₂</string>
<string name="appliances_carbon_title">Appliances Carbon</string> <string name="appliance_formula">CO₂ = (Power × Hours × Carbon Factor) / 1000</string> <string name="appliance_parameters">• Power: Device wattage (e.g., 150W for refrigerator)\n• Hours: Daily usage hours\n• Carbon Factor: 0.475 kg CO₂/kWh</string> <string name="appliance_example">Example: Refrigerator 150W × 24h → (150 × 24 × 0.475) / 1000 = 1.71 kg CO₂/day</string>
<string name="notifications_carbon_title">Notifications Carbon</string> <string name="notification_formula">CO₂ = (Notifications × Data Transfer × Carbon Factor) / 1000</string> <string name="notification_parameters">• Notifications: Daily notification count\n• Data Transfer: ~5KB average per notification\n• Carbon Factor: 0.06 kg CO₂ per GB data transferred</string> <string name="notification_example">Example: 100 notifications → (100 × 5 × 0.06) / 1,000,000 = 0.00003 kg CO₂</string>
<string name="data_sources_title">Data Sources & References</string> <string name="reference_1_title">IEA - Global Carbon Intensity</string> <string name="reference_1_description">International Energy Agency reports on global average grid carbon intensity (0.475 kg CO₂/kWh)</string> <string name="reference_2_title">The Shift Project - Digital Carbon Studies</string> <string name="reference_2_description">Research on energy consumption of digital devices and infrastructure</string> <string name="reference_3_title">Carbon Trust - Data Center Energy</string> <string name="reference_3_description">Industry standards for data transfer carbon emissions</string>
<string name="formulas_disclaimer">Note: These calculations are estimates based on average values. Actual carbon emissions may vary based on device type, location, and energy grid composition.</string>
<string name="formula_label">Formula</string> <string name="parameters_label">Parameters</string> <string name="example_label">Example Calculation</string> <string name="info_icon">Information icon</string> <string name="phone_icon">Phone icon</string> <string name="appliance_icon">Appliance icon</string> </resources>
